SELECT p.id, p.title, p.cover, p.content, p.user_id, p.comments, p.view, p.collects, p.create_time, p.modify_time, u.username, u.alias, u.avatar FROM sys_video_post p LEFT JOIN sys_user u ON p.user_id = u.id
date(p.create_time) <= date_add(curdate(), interval 1 day) AND date(p.create_time) >= date_sub(curdate(), interval 7 day)
AND p.id IN (SELECT post_id FROM sys_post_tag WHERE tag_id = #{tagId})
ORDER BY p.top DESC, p.create_time DESC
ORDER BY p.view DESC, p.create_time DESC

SELECT p.id, p.title, p.cover, p.content, p.user_id, p.comments, p.view, p.collects, p.create_time, p.modify_time, u.username, u.alias, u.avatar FROM sys_video_post p LEFT JOIN sys_user u ON p.user_id = u.id WHERE p.id != #{id} ORDER BY rand(), p.view limit 10
